EmailTemplate.name: Back-to-School - Newspaper Markets
EmailTemplate.subject: Introducing 14 Days of Deals for Back-to-School
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
School is in session at DealChicken and you are invited. DealChicken is featuring 14 days of select savings on last-chance getaways, end of summer entertainment, events and more in addition to the traditional supplies and clothing. Don't miss your chance to get in early on the back to school rush. After all, 29% of back to school shoppers start shopping two months before school starts.
DealChicken will feature a new merchant daily from July 29- Aug. 11. For more information, download our 14 Days of Deals for Back-to-School information sheet.
To reserve one of 14 featured Back-to-School positions, contact {!Contact.OwnerFirstName} {!Contact.OwnerLastName} by July 15th at {!Contact.OwnerEmail} or {!Contact.OwnerPhone}.
DealChicken alerts consumers to great deals. Consumers purchase the deal on DealChicken.com and redeem at your location or website. Merchants receive a revenue split less a 2.5% credit card processing fee.
Why try DealChicken? Hear how DealChicken can transform your business and bring in new, high-quality customers
